title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint, cancelling the operation in the progress dialog does not have any effect. The progress dialog remains open and the exception breakpoint is still added.
EB: The progress dialog should close immediately when the cancel button is clicked, and the exception breakpoint should not be added.
SR: 1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint. 3) In the progress dialog, click the cancel button. The progress dialog should close immediately.
